channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broke park equipment, 12th July
item.description:

item.title: Leak outside 13 St Helier Court, N1 5SD, 12th July
item.description:
Hello, there has been a leak for the past 3 weeks outside flat 13 St Helier Court. It is forming a green patch on the floor which will likely get worse over time. The water comes out of that metal tube on the wall. Can someone please come and check?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This isnt the rubbish spot its the entrance to the estate, 12th July
